text:
Tabcorp | Melbourne | Australia | Node.JS and iOS

www.tab.com.au

Recognised internationally as a leader in responsible gambling, Tabcorp have digital at the heart of their strategy. At 70 strong, with a new team being built in Melbourne, we have an uncompromising test driven, Agile focussed approach. Our platform is Node.js based. We're always on the lookout for great Node engineers, as well as iOS, Android, Devops engineering skills. Visa sponsorship and relocation is available for the right candidates. Contact james (dot) richardson (at) tabcorp (dot) com (dot) au to apply and for more information.
